qa_single_promotion_triggered_by_acc_por.rule: (event.event == 'portal_item_claimed' and event.msg.trigger_group == 'accPortal4' and event.msg.amount > 0 and accPortal4claimedCounter >= 5)

counters.name: accPortal4claimedCounter
counters.query: if(event == 'portal_item_claimed' and msg.trigger_group == 'accPortal4' and msg.amount > 0, msg.amount, 0)
